title: Lull Bed
description:
With its cloud-like frame and luxe upholstery, the Lull Bed (2023) invites ultra-relaxation. Australian design practice ELLISON STUDIOS brings a ’70s spirit to contemporary bedrooms with Lull’s generous proportions and contrasting textures. Its frame and legs are upholstered in a choice of lush fabrics, including velvety Sandon made from 100% GRS-certified recycled plastic bottles. Fully upholstered disc feet complete the rich softness of its silhouette. Elegant yet laid-back, Lull brings welcoming warmth and optimal comfort to the bedroom. Mattress sold separately. Made in U.S.A.
  • Sculptural, comfortable form in sensual, textural materials.
  • Upholstered in a choice of luxe fabrics, including 100% recycled velvet.
  • Durably constructed with a corner-blocked kiln-dried hardwood frame.
Brand
ELLISON STUDIOS
General Dimensions
  • 41⅜" H 87⅞" W 97¼" D
Product Weight
284 lbs
Assembly
Requires Assembly
Warranty
1-year warranty
Terms and conditions apply. Learn more

title: Matera Bed
description:
A trip to the Noguchi Museum in New York made Sean Yoo realize that he didn’t want to be a city planner after all. “One visit and I knew exactly what I wanted to do with my life,” he says. “I was particularly attracted to the way Noguchi applied sculptural qualities to common household items. It seemed to give meaning and purpose to otherwise meaningless objects.” Yoo’s beautifully crafted Matera Bed (2007) incorporates that ethos. Designed while Yoo was living in Matera, Italy, it features clean lines, beveled edges and slotted mortise-and-tenon corner joints. The slotted base and headboard add visual interest and echo a design thread used throughout the Matera collection. Made in Malaysia.

The bed with storage has six (three on each side side) full-extension drawers, providing ample space for clothing and bedding, all of which can be quietly accessed without disturbing your partner thanks to soft-closing glides.
  • Clean lines, beveled edges and slotted mortise-and-tenon corner joints.
  • Slotted base and headboard for an airy feel.
  • Available with or without storage drawers.
  • Bed with Storage has six full-extension drawers with soft-closing glides.
  • This bed requires no box spring.
Brand
Design Within Reach
Collection
Matera Collection
General Dimensions
  • 37½" H 64⅝" W 83⅛" D
Product Weight
330.75 lbs
Assembly

title: Cove Bed
description:
“Giving respect to materials and craft is very important,” says Nathan Yong. In the case of the Cove Bed (2017), the Singapore-based designer fully demonstrates his reverence. The inner edges of the headboard, footboard and side rails, for instance, are rounded over rather than squared off. “I wanted to create a bed that’s sturdy but not clunky,” he says, “and to make the mattress seem like it’s ‘tucking into’ the bed frame.” The unadorned profile highlights the beauty of the wood, while the turned-and-tapered bedposts have tops that are subtly cupped. “It’s just a small thing,” he says of the latter. “But then you touch them, and there’s this moment that touches your senses.” Made in Malaysia.
  • Solid oak, walnut, or ebonized ash rails, bedposts and footboard.
  • Turned-and-tapered bedposts.
  • Ample space beneath the bed.
  • High headboard option for queen and king sizes.
Brand
Design Within Reach
Collection
Cove Bedroom Collection

title: Nelson Thin Edge Bed
description:
The process of bringing the Nelson Thin Edge Bed (1954) back into production began at the Herman Miller Archives, where engineers carefully studied vintage pieces and original drawings. In keeping with George Nelson’s vision for a collection capable of adapting to the times, this bed is now available in larger sizes that weren’t commonly available in the 1950s. Solid ash slats replace springs to accommodate an invention that also didn’t exist in Nelson’s day: memory-foam mattresses. Updated finishes reflect new technologies as well as the aesthetic preferences of today’s consumer: Walnut subs for stained ash, while white ash updates the original birch. Yet changes withstanding, the designs are utterly and unmistakably Nelson in their exceptional simplicity and clarity. This is the authentic Nelson Thin Edge Bed by Herman Miller. Mattress not included. Made in Malaysia.

Twin, full and queen platforms ship fully assembled. King and California King platforms ship as two halves.
  • Solid walnut or white-ash frame.
  • Solid ash slats allow for air circulation.
  • Two headboard and base styles.
  • Legs available in solid wood or stainless steel.
  • Sizes and wood finishes reflect today’s aesthetics.
Brand
Herman Miller
Collection
Nelson Thin Edge Collection
General Dimensions
  • 34¾" H 40¼" W 84¼" D
Product Weight
92.75 lbs
Assembly

title: Sumu Bed
description:
The DWR-exclusive Sumu Collection combines the best of two worlds: The Japanese wood joinery technique of tsugite and carpentry techniques from Eastern Europe. With its gently rounded edges, the Sumu Bed (2024) brings a serene, pared-back beauty to the bedroom. Masterful wood-working seamlessly connects the solid oak frame without glue or nails. Artfully exposed joints highlight the simple beauty of the wood. An optional headboard (sold separately) adds an extra layer of character, drawing attention to the intricate grain and fine craftsmanship. Made in Estonia.
  • Inspired by Japanese wood joinery and European carpentry techniques for an artfully pared-back collection.
  • Features gently rounded edges and seamlessly exposed joints.
  • Solid oak frame.
  • Optional headboard (sold separately.)
Brand
Design Within Reach

title: Nest Storage Bed
description:
Designed to meet the need for extra storage in compact spaces, the Nest Storage Bed (2014) also holds its own in larger ones. With a mattress platform that rises on smooth-operating gas pistons built to withstand daily use, Nest keeps its storage compartment inconspicuous. Slipcovers are removable for dry cleaning. Mattress sold separately. (Mattresses more than 10 inches high interfere with the opening motion of the platform. We recommend our Sonno Mattress.) Made in Italy.
  • Hidden storage compartment can be accessed without removing mattress.
  • Removable leather or fabric slipcovers.
  • Foam-padded headboard and frame.

Design Within Reach

title: Emmy Bed
description:
Designed exclusively for DWR, the Emmy Bed (2023) is a generously scaled, fully upholstered platform bed with an eye-catching curved headboard that draws on the design of our bestselling Emmy Sofa by Egg Collective. The sheltering, curved wing headboard creates a cozy, tucked-in feeling and is finished with turned wood detailing. The upholstery is beautifully stitched and expertly applied to hug every curve. Made in the USA with some imported components.
  • Curved enveloping headboard.
  • Rounded edges.
  • Fabric or leather upholstery.
  • Low upholstered platform on solid wood legs.
  • Works with a range of room styles, from modern to traditional.
  • Designed by Egg Collective for DWR.

title: Miro Bed
description:
In designing the Miro Bed (2020), designer Gabriel Tan had several must-haves in mind: functionality, beauty, comfort, and ease of changing sheets. Mission accomplished. This bed has a soft and generous headboard that’s angled, much like the back of a sofa, to create a comfortable place to read, work on a laptop, or watch TV. Its platform was inspired by the idea of a raft, “where one is floating on a platform of comfort and safety,” he says. The wide border around the mattress crafted in solid wood with beautifully rounded corners also serves as a useful space for placing books and phones. Frame made in Malaysia, headboard made in Italy.

Please note: Platforms on all beds come in two pieces.
  • Slightly angled headboard to support reading and watching TV.
  • Features stately solid wood platform to store phones and books.
  • Solid oak or walnut legs with soft taper.

title: Decimo Bed
description:
The Décimo Bed (2022) commemorates a decade of design by Veta. Conceived by co-founder Rodrigo Mendoza, whose work reflects a deep reverence for Mexican modernism, this solid oak piece brings warmth to the bedroom. Geometric bowling eases handling while the rear shelf can display objects. Made in Mexico.
  • Rear shelf holds treasured belongings.
  • Geometric bowling eases handling.
  • Headboard, shelf and platform made of solid oak.

title: Vella Bed
description:
Michele di Fonzo is the third generation of his family to build upon the leather traditions his grandfather began in 1921. For nearly a century, his family has been transforming leather into a versatile and modern product, drawing inspiration from other fields like fashion and luggage design, where leather is as much about structure as it is about aesthetics. Each Vella Bed (2016) takes more than seven hours to create, and is finished by hand with skill, passion and care. Made in Italy.
  • Carefully crafted and finished by hand.
  • Upholstered with stain-resistant split-grain leather.
  • Features an elegant, slender frame.
